content: Is https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/79254 easy enough for a new contributor to start with ?
I'm reading this https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/rustdoc-internals.html#from-clean-to-crate at the moment which seems relevant (it speaks about local items)
'items' is in the language sense, not like resources

I would not start with https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/79254 because it needs design - where should the resources go? what if they're big - should there be a size limit? what if they don't exist - should rustdoc give an error?
